improper.translation[0].definitions[0].e: He realised that it was improper for a police officer to accept gifts.
it is improper (for somebody) to do something
improper.translation[0].definitions[1].d: not sensible, right, or fair in a particular situation
improper.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It would be improper of me to comment before the election outcome is known.
it is improper to do something
